name: The Last Day (itch) (Gameheads)
description:
The Last Day is a top-down 2D shooter about fending off waves of enemies to escape the zombie apocalypse. Fight zombies, collect new weapons types, and defeat the leader to survive the hoard. 

Available in PC or Mac. 

How To Play:

  • Controller
    • Left Analog Stick = Movement
    • Right Analogy Stick = Direction
    • LB = Power Shot
    • RB = Place Mine
    • LT = Multi Shot
    • RT = Shoot
    • L3 = Place Turret
  • Keyboard
    • WASD/Arrow Keys = Movement
    • Left Click = Shoot
    • Space = Power Shot
    • Right Click = Multi Shot
    • Q = Place Mine
    • E = Place Turret
